page.title: 18THE WORKING MEN'S CLUB.
page.content: The exterior of the{Brafield}Working Men's Club may not look very grand but {inside}recent improvements provide a terrific place for many villagers to meet, drink and have a chat. Recent internal redecoration has made the club even more attractive than before. For instance, the{bar} which is "open plan" now rubs shoulders with a games room. The{games {room}has skittle tables, pool and bar billiards and a dart board. The club also boasts a successful{skittles {team. Not far away, "Space Invader" machines stand alongside a log effect fire and pendulum clock all in a cosy{ {lounge.}The{Concert Room}which is always in use at Weekends can be split into two, creating a stage and dance floor. Entertainment consists of live bands and{BINGO.
